trans-unit.resname: ZNC·1 | Anowon, the Ruin Thief | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Anowon, the Ruin Thief
trans-unit.target: 遗迹窃贼亚诺文

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·1 | Anowon, the Ruin Thief | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Other Rogues you control get +1/+1.\nWhenever one or more Rogues you control deal combat damage to a player, that player mills a card for each 1 damage dealt to them. If the player mills at least one creature card this way, you draw a card. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他浪客得+1/+1。 每当由你操控的一个或数个浪客对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手每受到1点伤害，他便磨一张牌。如果该牌手以此法磨掉至少一张生物牌，则你抓一张牌。（磨一张牌的流程是牌手将其牌库顶的牌置入其坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·2 | Obuun, Mul Daya Ancestor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Obuun, Mul Daya Ancestor
trans-unit.target: 慕达雅先灵奥布恩

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·2 | Obuun, Mul Daya Ancestor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target land you control becomes an X/X Elemental creature with trample and haste until end of turn, where X is Obuun's power. It's still a land.\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，至多一个目标由你操控的地成为X/X，具践踏与敏捷异能的元素生物直到回合结束，X为奥布恩的力量。它仍然是地。 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Trove Warden
trans-unit.target: 宝库护卫

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·3 | Trove Warden | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, exile target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, put each permanent card exiled with it onto the battlefield under the control of that card's owner.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，将目标总法术力费用等于或小于3的永久物牌从你的坟墓场放逐。 当CARDNAME死去时，将所有以其放逐的永久物牌在各自拥有者的操控下放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Enigma Thief
trans-unit.target: 窃谜史芬斯

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·4 | Enigma Thief | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Prowl {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Sphinx or Rogue.)\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, for each opponent, return up to one target nonland permanent that player controls to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 伺机{3}{U}（如果你本回合中曾以史芬斯或浪客对任一牌手造成战斗伤害，则你可以支付此咒语的伺机费用来施放它。） 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，为每位对手各进行以下流程～将至多一个目标由该牌手操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+0.\nWhenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may cast a creature spell from that player's graveyard this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.\nEquip {3}
Geode Rager
trans-unit.target: 晶岩怒兽

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·6 | Geode Rager | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, goad each creature target player controls. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 先攻 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，煽惑由目标牌手操控的每个生物。（直到你的下一个回合，那些生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.source: Its crystalline core refracts light into chaos.
trans-unit.target: 它的晶状核心能将明澈射线折成混沌散光。

trans-unit.target: 延生{W}（{W}，{T}：在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。延生的时机视同法术。） 每个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物均具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: The fastest way across the dunes is above.
trans-unit.target: 横跨沙丘的捷径在空中。

trans-unit.source: Flying\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may exile target nonland permanent other than CARDNAME.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, return all cards exiled with it to the battlefield under their owners' control.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你可以放逐目标CARDNAME以外的非地永久物。 当CARDNAME离开战场时，将所有以它放逐的牌在各自拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的非地永久物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.source: The Champion reached for a stone, and Heliod placed the sun into her hand.\n—*The Theriad*
trans-unit.target: 天尊伸手想要去拿石块，赫利欧德则将整个太阳递到她掌心。 ～*《塞洛亚特》*

trans-unit.target: 判罪

trans-unit.source: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
trans-unit.target: 将目标进行攻击的生物置于其拥有者的牌库底。其操控者获得等同于其防御力的生命。

trans-unit.source: "No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now."\n—Alovnek, Boros guildmage
trans-unit.target: 「既然需签署的文件一无遗漏，仲裁者当然会放过你。但我现在就要主持正义！」 ～波洛斯公会法师阿劳涅

trans-unit.target: 选择一项或都选～ •放逐目标神器。 •放逐目标结界。

trans-unit.source: The Izzet mage knew she would neither get her thermoinverter back nor have the satisfaction of exploding it herself.
trans-unit.target: 伊捷法师知道这样一来，不仅手中的热能反转器会一去不返，自己也无法享受亲手引爆它的快感。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，振励2。（于由你操控的生物中选择一个防御力最小的生物，在其上放置两个+1/+1指示物。） 每当一个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物攻击时，横置目标由防御牌手操控的生物。

trans-unit.source: When the earth shudders, the sky overflows.

trans-unit.source: Kor have no concept of exploration. They return to homelands forgotten.
trans-unit.target: 寇族没有探险的概念。他们是返回遗忘的家园。

trans-unit.source: "You can come back once you've learned some manners—and figured out how to reconstitute your physical forms."

trans-unit.source: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts—on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.
trans-unit.target: 欧娜之歌有如走调的晚餐铃声。所有仙灵都回到家中，只留下欧娜进餐，享用着他们献上的窃来眠梦与流言。

trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库顶的五张牌。由任一对手将它们分成两堆。将其中一堆置于你手上，另一堆则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·25 | Fact or Fiction | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Try to pretend like you understand what's important."

trans-unit.source: History may be written by the triumphant, but it's often rewritten by the troublesome.

If this spell's prowl cost was paid, take an extra turn after this one.

trans-unit.target: 身分遭窃

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·37 | Stolen Identity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or creature.\nCipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标神器或生物之复制品。 暗码（然后你可以放逐此咒语牌，并赋码于一个由你操控的生物上。每当该生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，其操控者可以施放所赋码之牌的复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。）

trans-unit.source: Triton Shorestalker
trans-unit.target: 岸袭屈东

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·38 | Triton Shorestalker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "Who will miss you, drywalker? A wife? A child? Perhaps they will blame the sea for your fate, and teach future generations to stay far away from it."
trans-unit.target: 「地上人，谁会思念你？妻子？孩子？或许他们会将你的命运归咎于大海，教导后世子孙远离它。」

trans-unit.source: Whirler Rogue
trans-unit.target: 旋翼浪客

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·39 | Whirler Rogue | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.\nTap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。 横置两个由你操控且未横置的神器：目标生物本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Changeling Outcast
trans-unit.target: 化形黜人

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·40 | Changeling Outcast | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)\nCARDNAME can't block and can't be blocked.
trans-unit.target: 化形（此牌是所有生物类别。） CARDNAME不能进行阻挡，也不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: A mercurial face sows distrust. Distrust reaps a lonely life.
trans-unit.target: 变幻面容埋下猜疑祸根。猜疑祸根长出孤独人生。

trans-unit.source: Endless Obedience
trans-unit.target: 无尽服从

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·41 | Endless Obedience | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)\nPut target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 召集（此咒语能用你的生物来协助施放。你于施放此咒语时每横置一个生物，就能为此咒语支付{1}或一点该生物颜色之法术力。） 将目标生物牌在你的操控下从坟墓场放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Fated Return
trans-unit.target: 命定归返

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·42 | Fated Return | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains indestructible. If it's your turn, scry 2.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌在你的操控下从坟墓场放进战场。它获得不灭异能。如果是在你的回合中，则占卜2。

trans-unit.source: Frogtosser Banneret
trans-unit.target: 掷蛙掌旗

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·43 | Frogtosser Banneret | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nGoblin spells and Rogue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 你施放的鬼怪咒语和浪客咒语减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.source: The Frogtossers thread feathers, bones, and trophies from past raids into their standards, believing they fuel the warren with the anger of its victims.
trans-unit.target: 掷蛙人把羽毛，骨头，以及过去劫掠的战利品缝在战旗上，相信这些倒楣鬼的愤怒会让繁殖地更强大。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·44 | Gonti, Lord of Luxury | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gonti, Lord of Luxury
trans-unit.target: 奢华领主贡提

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·44 | Gonti, Lord of Luxury | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of target opponent's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest on the bottom of that library in a random order. You may look at and cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.
trans-unit.target: 死触 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视目标对手牌库顶的四张牌，将其中一张牌面朝下地放逐，然后将其余的牌以随机顺序置于该牌库底。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以检视并施放该牌，且你可以将法术力视同任意种类的法术力来支付施放该咒语的费用。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·45 | In Garruk's Wake | Card Name
trans-unit.source: In Garruk's Wake
trans-unit.target: 贾路开道

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·45 | In Garruk's Wake | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures you don't control and all planeswalkers you don't control.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有不由你操控的生物和鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·45 | In Garruk's Wake | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Beyond pain, beyond obsession and wild despair, there lies a place of twisted power only the most tormented souls can reach.
trans-unit.target: 有一处超越痛苦，超越执着与绝望，充满扭曲力量的所在，只有遭受折磨最深的灵魂才能到达。

trans-unit.source: Marsh Flitter
trans-unit.target: 沼地掠空客

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·46 | Marsh Flitter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature tokens.\nSacrifice a Goblin: CARDNAME has base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个1/1黑色鬼怪／浪客衍生生物。 牺牲一个鬼怪：CARDNAME的基础力量与防御力为3/3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Murder
trans-unit.target: 谋杀

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.source: "By fate or by will, every reign must come to an end."\n—Kethis, the Hidden Hand
trans-unit.target: 「王朝终有倾覆时，或因天灾，或因人祸。」 ～幕宾柯希斯

trans-unit.source: Necromantic Selection
trans-unit.target: 物尽天择

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·48 | Necromantic Selection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures, then return a creature card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control. It's a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物，然后将一张以此法置入坟墓场的生物牌在你的操控下移回战场。它额外具有黑色此颜色与灵俑此类别。放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: It shambled from the cloud of ash and bone dust, undeterred by its own extinction.
trans-unit.target: 残灰散尽，骨骸落定，它自混沌中蹒跚而出，饶是自身灭绝也未能惊动分毫。

trans-unit.source: Nighthowler
trans-unit.target: 夜嚎怪

trans-unit.source: Bestow {2}{B}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)\nCARDNAME and enchanted creature each get +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
trans-unit.target: 神授{2}{B}{B}（如果你支付此牌的神授费用来施放它，则它便是具「结附于生物」的灵气咒语。如果它未结附于生物上，就会再度成为生物。） CARDNAME与所结附的生物各得+X/+X，X为所有坟墓场中的生物牌数量。

trans-unit.source: Ogre Slumlord
trans-unit.target: 贫窟霸食人魔

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·50 | Ogre Slumlord | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.\nRats you control have deathtouch.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个非衍生物的生物死去时，你可以派出一个1/1黑色老鼠衍生生物。 由你操控的老鼠具有死触异能。

trans-unit.source: "His tenement is filled with the most vile, disgusting vermin. It's infested with rats, too."\n—Branko One-Ear
trans-unit.target: 「他的居所充满最邪恶恶心的病媒，还有鼠辈横行。」 ～单耳布兰可

trans-unit.source: Oona's Blackguard
trans-unit.target: 欧娜的黑卫士

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·51 | Oona's Blackguard | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nEach other Rogue creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.\nWhenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 由你操控的其他浪客生物进战场时上面额外有一个+1/+1指示物。 每当一个由你操控且上面有+1/+1指示物的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·52 | Price of Fame | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Price of Fame
trans-unit.target: 名誉的代价

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·52 | Price of Fame | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a legendary creature.\nDestroy target creature.\nSurveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
trans-unit.target: 如果此咒语以传奇生物为目标，则它便减少{2}来施放。 消灭目标生物。 刺探2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌置入你的坟墓场，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·53 | Rise from the Grave | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rise from the Grave
trans-unit.target: 坟场复生

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·53 | Rise from the Grave | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌在你的操控下从坟墓场放进战场。该生物额外具有黑色此颜色与灵俑此类别。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·53 | Rise from the Grave | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Death is no excuse for disobedience."\n—Liliana Vess
trans-unit.target: 「死亡不是抗命的藉口。」 ～莉莲娜维斯

trans-unit.source: Sepulchral Primordial
trans-unit.target: 阴森原祖

trans-unit.source: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may put up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 威吓（此生物只能被神器生物和／或与它有共通颜色的生物阻挡。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，为每位对手各进行以下流程～你可以将至多一张目标生物牌在你的操控下从该牌手的坟墓场放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Stinkdrinker Bandit
trans-unit.target: 臭饮土匪

trans-unit.source: Prowl {1}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.)\nWhenever a Rogue you control attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 伺机{1}{B}（如果你本回合中曾以鬼怪或浪客对任一牌手造成战斗伤害，则你可以支付此咒语的伺机费用来施放它。） 每当一个由你操控的浪客攻击且未受阻挡时，它得+2/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·56 | Syr Konrad, the Grim | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Syr Konrad, the Grim
trans-unit.target: 冷酷孔纳德爵士

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·56 | Syr Konrad, the Grim | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature dies, or a creature card is put into a graveyard from anywhere other than the battlefield, or a creature card leaves your graveyard, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent.\n{1}{B}: Each player mills a card. (They each put the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物死去，或一张生物牌从战场以外的任何区域进入坟墓场，或一张生物牌离开你的坟墓场时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害。 {1}{B}：每位牌手各磨一张牌。（他们各将其牌库顶的牌置入其坟墓场。）

trans-unit.source: Zulaport Cutthroat
trans-unit.target: 筑拉波割喉客

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·57 | Zulaport Cutthroat | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控的生物死去时，每位对手各失去1点生命，且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Eldrazi? Ha! Try walking through Zulaport at night with your pockets full. Now *that's* dangerous."
trans-unit.target: 「奥札奇？呵呵！不妨腰缠万贯时在夜晚来筑拉波走一遭。*这*才叫危险。」

trans-unit.source: Abundance
trans-unit.target: 丰衣足食

trans-unit.source: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将抓一张牌，则你可以改为选择地或非地，并从你牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张该种类的牌为止。将该牌置于你手上，然后将所有其他以此法展示的牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Acidic Slime
trans-unit.target: 酸液黏菌

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·59 | Acidic Slime | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
trans-unit.target: 死触 当CARDNAME进战场时，消灭目标神器，结界或地。

trans-unit.source: It fears no sword and leaves no bones behind.
trans-unit.target: 它迎刀剑而上，身后尸骨无存。

trans-unit.source: Armorcraft Judge
trans-unit.target: 制甲艺评审

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·60 | Armorcraft Judge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你每操控一个其上有+1/+1指示物的生物，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Were she not a judge, she'd win the division herself.
trans-unit.target: 她若不是评审，本项目桂冠非她莫属。

trans-unit.source: Beanstalk Giant
trans-unit.target: 豆茎巨人

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·61 | Beanstalk Giant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的地数量。

trans-unit.source: Fertile Footsteps
trans-unit.target: 丰沃脚步

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·61 | Fertile Footsteps | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。（然后放逐此牌。之后你还可以从放逐区中施放该生物。）

trans-unit.source: Circuitous Route
trans-unit.target: 迂回路线

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·62 | Circuitous Route | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and/or Gate cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌和／或门牌，将它们横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "The shortest path between two points is not always the safest."\n—Tamina, district guide
trans-unit.target: 「两点之间最近的路线并不总是最安全的。」 ～城区向导塔米娜

trans-unit.source: Elvish Rejuvenator
trans-unit.target: 回春妖精

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·63 | Elvish Rejuvenator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以将其中的一张地牌横置放进战场。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·64 | Embodiment of Insight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Embodiment of Insight
trans-unit.target: 洞察具象

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·64 | Embodiment of Insight | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nLand creatures you control have vigilance.\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target land you control become a 3/3 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 由你操控的地生物具有警戒异能。 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你可以使目标由你操控的地成为3/3，具敏捷异能的元素生物直到回合结束。它仍然是地。

trans-unit.source: Evolution Sage
trans-unit.target: 演化智者

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·65 | Evolution Sage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: 每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，增殖。（选择任意数量的永久物和／或牌手，然后为其已有之每种指示物各多放置一个同类的指示物。）

trans-unit.source: "To care for yourself, cultivate the world. To care for the world, cultivate yourself."
trans-unit.target: 「关怀自己，栽培世界。关怀世界，栽培自己。」

trans-unit.source: Far Wanderings
trans-unit.target: 远地遨游

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·66 | Far Wanderings | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.\nThreshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将该牌横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。 门槛～如果你的坟墓场中有七张或更多牌，则改为从你的牌库中搜寻至多三张基本地牌，将它们横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Fertilid
trans-unit.target: 沃壤灵

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.\n{1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles their library.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。 {1}{G}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：目标牌手从其牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后将其牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Harmonize
trans-unit.target: 和谐

trans-unit.source: Draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Animals commune with their environment without the need for language. Theirs is a fundamental connection that surpasses flimsy words."\n—Vivien Reid
trans-unit.target: 「动物不需语言，就能与周遭环境沟通。它们之间这种基础联系远胜粗劣言语。」 ～薇薇安瑞德

trans-unit.source: Harrow
trans-unit.target: 整地

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.\nSearch your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个地，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 从你的牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌，将它们放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: The Roil redraws the world as it passes, leaving only the hedrons unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 狂搅所经之处，地貌为之改写，只有晶石维持不变。

trans-unit.source: Inspiring Call
trans-unit.target: 振奋呼号

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·70 | Inspiring Call | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个其上有+1/+1指示物的生物，便抓一张牌。这些生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它们消灭。）

trans-unit.source: "Now is the hour. Ours is the duty. For victory and family—charge!"
trans-unit.target: 「时机就在眼前。眼前只有荣誉。为了胜利与家人～前进！」

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·71 | Keeper of Fables | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Keeper of Fables
trans-unit.target: 寓言守护兽

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·71 | Keeper of Fables | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more non-Human creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个或数个由你操控的非人类生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·71 | Keeper of Fables | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Only the lion knows more stories than I do."\n—Chulane, Teller of Tales
trans-unit.target: 「只有那头狮子知道的故事比我多。」 ～说书人楚兰

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·72 | Khalni Heart Expedition | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Khalni Heart Expedition
trans-unit.target: 坎尼之心探险

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·72 | Khalni Heart Expedition | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on CARDNAME.\nRemove three quest counters from CARDNAME and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个探索指示物。 从CARDNAME上移去三个探索指示物并牺牲它：从你的牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌，将它们横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Kodama's Reach
trans-unit.target: 木灵展势

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·73 | Kodama's Reach | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌，展示这些牌，将一张横置放进战场，另一张则置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "The land grows only where the kami will it."\n—Dosan the Falling Leaf
trans-unit.target: 「土地只能长出神明允许的东西。」 ～落叶大师道三

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·74 | The Mending of Dominaria | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Mending of Dominaria
trans-unit.target: 多明纳里亚愈合

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·74 | The Mending of Dominaria | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)\nI, II — Mill two cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.\nIII — Return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, then shuffle your graveyard into your library.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到III后牺牲之。） I, II — 磨两张牌，然后你可以将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。 III — 将所有地牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，然后将你的坟墓场洗入你的牌库。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·75 | Multani, Yavimaya's Avatar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Multani, Yavimaya's Avatar
trans-unit.target: 亚维马雅化身穆塔尼

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·75 | Multani, Yavimaya's Avatar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Reach, trample\nCARDNAME gets +1/+1 for each land you control and each land card in your graveyard.\n{1}{G}, Return two lands you control to their owner's hand: Return Multani from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 延势，践踏 你每操控一个地或你的坟墓场中每有一张地牌，CARDNAME便得+1/+1。 {1}{G}，将两个由你操控的地移回其拥有者手上：将穆塔尼从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: Nissa's Renewal
trans-unit.target: 妮莎重光

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·76 | Nissa's Renewal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. You gain 7 life.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻至多三张基本地牌，将它们横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。你获得7点生命。

trans-unit.source: Her connection to the plane restored, Nissa felt the power of Zendikar surge through her.
trans-unit.target: 妮莎恢复与赞迪卡的联系之后，她感受到时空力量在她全身翻腾。

trans-unit.source: Rampaging Baloths
trans-unit.target: 莽闯巴洛西

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·77 | Rampaging Baloths | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你可以派出一个4/4绿色野兽衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "When the land is angry, so are they."\n—Nissa Revane
trans-unit.target: 「当大地发怒，它们也闹脾气。」 ～妮莎瑞文

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·78 | Retreat to Kazandu | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Retreat to Kazandu
trans-unit.target: 撤往卡赞度

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·78 | Retreat to Kazandu | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —\n• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\n• You gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，选择一项～ •在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 •你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·79 | Return of the Wildspeaker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Return of the Wildspeaker
trans-unit.target: 召兽使复归

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·79 | Return of the Wildspeaker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Draw cards equal to the greatest power among non-Human creatures you control.\n• Non-Human creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •抓若干牌，其数量等同于由你操控的非人类生物中力量最大者的数值。 •由你操控的非人类生物得+3/+3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·79 | Return of the Wildspeaker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The curse is broken."
trans-unit.target: 「诅咒失效了。」

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·80 | Rites of Flourishing | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rites of Flourishing
trans-unit.target: 茁壮仪式

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·80 | Rites of Flourishing | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.\nEach player may play an additional land on each of their turns.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的抓牌步骤开始时，该牌手额外抓一张牌。 每位牌手在自己的每个回合中均可以额外使用一个地。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·80 | Rites of Flourishing | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Dance, and bring forth the coil! It is an umbilical to Gaea herself, fattening us with the earth's rich bounty."
trans-unit.target: 「以舞蹈引领这盘卷！它宛如盖亚赐予的脐带，以大地的丰饶滋养我们。」

trans-unit.source: Satyr Wayfinder
trans-unit.target: 引路羊蹄人

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·81 | Satyr Wayfinder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，展示你牌库顶的四张牌。你可以将其中一张地牌置于你手上。将其余的牌置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: The first satyr to wake after a revel must search for the site of the next one.
trans-unit.target: 在欢宴后第一个苏醒的羊蹄人，必须负责寻找下一场欢宴的地点。

trans-unit.source: Sporemound
trans-unit.target: 孢子堆

trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，派出一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "If you threaten its territory, it produces spores. Actually, no matter what you do, it produces spores."\n—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist
trans-unit.target: 「如果你威胁到其领域，它会产生孢子。事实上，无论你做什么，它都会产生孢子。」 ～卡拉谷博物学者哈地卡登

trans-unit.source: Springbloom Druid
trans-unit.target: 春华德鲁伊

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·83 | Springbloom Druid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以牺牲一个地。若你如此作，则从你的牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌，将它们横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "New growth applies a healing poultice to wounds long scabbed over."
trans-unit.target: 「全新生机为早已结痂的伤口涂上治疗药膏。」

trans-unit.source: Sylvan Advocate
trans-unit.target: 森林拥护人

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·84 | Sylvan Advocate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nAs long as you control six or more lands, CARDNAME and land creatures you control get +2/+2.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 只要你操控六个或更多地，CARDNAME和由你操控的地生物便得+2/+2。

trans-unit.source: "The land gives of itself. Its abundance provides, even in times of chaos."
trans-unit.target: 「大地自给自足。纵是混乱时期，仍有丰裕收成。」

trans-unit.source: Tuskguard Captain
trans-unit.target: 牙卫队长

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·85 | Tuskguard Captain | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Outlast {G} ({G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)\nEach creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
trans-unit.target: 延生{G}（{G}，{T}：在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。延生的时机视同法术。） 每个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物均具有践踏异能。

trans-unit.source: One quiet word sets off the stampede.
trans-unit.target: 低声轻语便能引领狂奔。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·86 | Waker of the Wilds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Waker of the Wilds
trans-unit.target: 蛮荒醒眠师

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·86 | Waker of the Wilds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {X}{G}{G}: Put X +1/+1 counters on target land you control. That land becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: {X}{G}{G}：在目标由你操控的地上放置X个+1/+1指示物。该地成为0/0，具敏捷异能的元素生物。它仍然是地。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·86 | Waker of the Wilds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Our foes are many and mighty, but not as many as the trees or as mighty as the sea."
trans-unit.target: 「敌人虽众，但比不过丛林繁木；对手虽强，但比不过大海汪洋。」

trans-unit.source: Yavimaya Elder
trans-unit.target: 亚维马雅长者

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·87 | Yavimaya Elder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.\n{2}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。 {2}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Zendikar's Roil
trans-unit.target: 赞迪卡的狂搅

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·88 | Zendikar's Roil | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 green Elemental creature token.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，派出一个2/2绿色元素衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "I was wrong. Zendikar isn't after me. It isn't after any of us. It's not evil or vengeful. It's magnificent . . . but it's in pain."\n—Nissa Revane
trans-unit.target: 「我错了。赞迪卡找上的不是我。它根本没找上任何人。它并不邪恶，也不怀怨仇。它壮丽非凡. . .却饱受痛苦。」 ～妮莎瑞文

trans-unit.source: Consuming Aberration
trans-unit.target: 吞噬畸变体

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·89 | Consuming Aberration | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your opponents' graveyards.\nWhenever you cast a spell, each opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于所有对手坟墓场中牌的总数量。 每当你施放咒语时，每位对手各从其牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张地牌为止，然后将这些牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·90 | Extract from Darkness | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Extract from Darkness
trans-unit.target: 黯域掘力

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·90 | Extract from Darkness | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player mills two cards. Then you put a creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各磨两张牌。然后你将一张生物牌在你的操控下从坟墓场放进战场。（磨一张牌的流程是牌手将其牌库顶的牌置入其坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·90 | Extract from Darkness | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: If you want to wreak havoc above, sometimes it's best to look below.
trans-unit.target: 如果想在上面搞破坏，有时最好先低头看一看。

trans-unit.source: Ground Assault
trans-unit.target: 地面袭击

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·91 | Ground Assault | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于由你操控的地数量。

trans-unit.source: "Taking down a dragon is easy. All you need is enough space to get in a good swing."\n—Narbulg Nine Fingers
trans-unit.target: 「击倒龙很容易。你只需要有足够的空间来出手。」 ～九指纳博

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·92 | Lazav, Dimir Mastermind | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lazav, Dimir Mastermind
trans-unit.target: 底密尔首脑拉札夫

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·92 | Lazav, Dimir Mastermind | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hexproof\nWhenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may have CARDNAME become a copy of that card, except its name is CARDNAME, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has hexproof and this ability.
trans-unit.target: 辟邪 每当一张生物牌从任何区域置入对手的坟墓场时，你可以使CARDNAME成为该牌的复制品，但其名称仍是CARDNAME，额外具有传奇此超类别，且具有辟邪与此异能。

trans-unit.source: Living Twister
trans-unit.target: 生体龙卷

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·93 | Living Twister | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {1}{R}, Discard a land card: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to any target.\n{G}: Return a tapped land you control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: {1}{R}，弃一张地牌：CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成2点伤害。 {G}：将一个由你操控且已横置的地移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "The ancient places of Ravnica awaken, stirred by the hoofbeats of Ilharg!"\n—Nikya of the Old Ways
trans-unit.target: 「衣哈格的铁蹄惊世间，拉尼卡古地皆醒转。」 ～古式信徒妮恰

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·94 | Mina and Denn, Wildborn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mina and Denn, Wildborn
trans-unit.target: 不驯双生弥娜与丹恩

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·94 | Mina and Denn, Wildborn | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.\n{R}{G}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target creature gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 你在自己的每个回合中可以额外使用一个地。 {R}{G}，将一个由你操控的地移回其拥有者手上：目标生物获得践踏异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·94 | Mina and Denn, Wildborn | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Greenweaver Mina and her twin brother Denn lead the last of the Mul Daya into an uncertain future.
trans-unit.target: 织碧弥娜和她的双胞胎兄弟丹恩领导着慕达雅最后的幸存者，迈向未知的未来。

trans-unit.source: Naya Charm
trans-unit.target: 纳雅护符

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·95 | Naya Charm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose one —
• CARDNAME deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Return target card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.
• Tap all creatures target player controls.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •CARDNAME对目标生物造成3点伤害。 •将目标牌从坟墓场移回其拥有者手上。 •横置由目标牌手操控的所有生物。

trans-unit.source: Notion Thief
trans-unit.target: 心念盗贼

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·96 | Notion Thief | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nIf an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 如果某对手将抓一张牌，且这不是其于自己的每个抓牌步骤中所抓的第一张牌，则改为该牌手略过该次抓牌且你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·97 | Omnath, Locus of Rage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Omnath, Locus of Rage
trans-unit.target: 怒火核欧那斯

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·97 | Omnath, Locus of Rage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 5/5 red and green Elemental creature token.\nWhenever CARDNAME or another Elemental you control dies, Omnath deals 3 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，派出一个5/5，红绿双色的元素衍生生物。 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控的元素死去时，欧那斯对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·98 | Oona, Queen of the Fae | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oona, Queen of the Fae
trans-unit.target: 仙儿女王欧娜

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·98 | Oona, Queen of the Fae | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{X}{UB}: Choose a color. Target opponent exiles the top X cards of their library. For each card of the chosen color exiled this way, create a 1/1 blue and black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {X}{U/B}：选择一种颜色。目标对手放逐其牌库顶的X张牌。每以此法放逐一张该颜色的牌，你便派出一个1/1，蓝黑双色，具飞行异能的仙灵／浪客衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Silumgar's Command
trans-unit.target: 席穆嘉的指命

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·99 | Silumgar's Command | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose two —
• Counter target noncreature spell.
• Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
• Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
• Destroy target planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 选择两项～ •反击目标非生物咒语。 •将目标永久物移回其拥有者手上。 •目标生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。 •消灭目标鹏洛客。

trans-unit.source: Soul Manipulation
trans-unit.target: 操弄灵魂

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·100 | Soul Manipulation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one or both —\n• Counter target creature spell.\n• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项或都选～ •反击目标生物咒语。 •将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: "Birth and death are both reversible."\n—Nicol Bolas
trans-unit.target: 「生与死均可逆向而行。」 ～尼可波拉斯

trans-unit.source: Spinal Embrace
trans-unit.target: 脊椎强殖

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·101 | Spinal Embrace | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Cast this spell only during combat.\nUntap target creature you don't control and gain control of it. It gains haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it. If you do, you gain life equal to its toughness.
trans-unit.target: 只能于战斗中施放此咒语。 重置目标不由你操控的生物并获得其操控权。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它牺牲。若你如此作，则你获得等同于其防御力的生命。

trans-unit.source: Struggle
trans-unit.target: 挣扎

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于由你操控的地数量。

trans-unit.source: Survive
trans-unit.target: 求存

trans-unit.source: Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)\nEach player shuffles their graveyard into their library.
trans-unit.target: 余响（此咒语只能从你的坟墓场中施放。然后将它放逐。） 每位牌手各将其坟墓场洗入其牌库。

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·103 | Sygg, River Cutthroat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sygg, River Cutthroat
trans-unit.target: 河流割喉人席格

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·103 | Sygg, River Cutthroat | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost 3 or more life this turn, you may draw a card. (Damage causes loss of life.)
trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有对手失去过3点或更多生命，则你可以抓一张牌。（伤害会导致失去生命。）

trans-unit.resname: ZNC·103 | Sygg, River Cutthroat | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's not a matter of deserving. It's a matter of strength. The power to hold versus the power to take."
trans-unit.target: 「这不是有无资格的问题，而是力量的问题。这是保有之力与夺取之力的对决。」

trans-unit.source: "My cats have taught me more about the sacred than anything in some old ruin."

trans-unit.source: "I swing a sword. It's a simple life. A lot of adventurers just see me as some cheap muscle, but if my steel lets them return home with their lives and limbs intact, then I've done my job."
trans-unit.target: 「我用得一手好剑。生活就是这么简单。虽然许多冒险者只把我当成廉价打手，但只要我手中武器能够保证他们四肢健全平安归家，那我也算完成任务了。」

trans-unit.source: "You called it the castle of a god. It is less than that, and so much more."\n—Kasla, Emeria shepherd

trans-unit.target: 警戒 只要你操控另一个僧侣，CARDNAME便具有系命异能。

trans-unit.source: In any adventuring party, the cleric is the heart: healing wounds, inspiring courage, and raising morale.
trans-unit.target: 无论哪支冒险团队，牧师都是队中核心：他们能够治疗伤口、激励斗志、鼓舞士气。

trans-unit.source: Farsight Adept

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you and target opponent each draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你和目标对手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "I've walked every one of the Teetering Peaks and never set a foot wrong. I can get you to safety."
trans-unit.target: 「我曾遍足晃摇山峰每座山头，一步都未曾走错。我能带你平安下山。」

trans-unit.source: Fearless Fledgling

trans-unit.source: Griffins nest in precarious places, so fledglings often find themselves taking their first flights at surprising moments.

trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.

trans-unit.source: Ondu moas make wildly uncomfortable mounts, but for determined warriors, their speed is enough to make up for it.

trans-unit.source: "Down below's where things go to die."\n—Kreq of Sunder Bay

trans-unit.source: Too flashy to ignore. Too fast to catch.

trans-unit.source: "The landbind ritual connects us to our sacred sites. More importantly, it binds us with every other kor who has visited here, through countless generations."
trans-unit.target: 「结地祭礼将我们与吾族圣地紧密相连。更重要的是，这仪式还能让我们跨越无数世代，与所有到过此地的寇族相连。」

trans-unit.source: "We are many, and righteous."

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·42 | Smite the Monstrous | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标力量等于或大于4的生物。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·42 | Smite the Monstrous | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Darkness always flees from the light, and I am the breaking dawn."\n—Kordain, luminarch of Kabira
trans-unit.target: 「明光所及之处，黑暗必将逃散，而我正是破晓清辉。」 ～卡彼拉辉侯柯尔丹

trans-unit.source: Tazeem Raptor
trans-unit.target: 塔晋猎鸟

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·43 | Tazeem Raptor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may return a land you control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将一个由你操控的地移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "It's good to see the eagles circling the Lighthouse once again."\n—Tazri
trans-unit.target: 「很高兴看到灯塔上空再有老鹰盘旋。」 ～塔兹莉

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·44 | Tazri, Beacon of Unity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tazri, Beacon of Unity
trans-unit.target: 齐心榜样塔兹莉

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·44 | Tazri, Beacon of Unity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature in your party.\n{2/U}{2/B}{2/R}{2/G}: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal up to two Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, Wizard, and/or Ally cards from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 你冒险团中每有一个生物，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。 {2/U}{2/B}{2/R}{2/G}：检视你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以展示其中的至多两张僧侣、浪客、战士、法术师和／或伙伴牌，并将它们置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Anticognition
trans-unit.target: 对抗认知

trans-unit.source: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell unless its controller pays {2}. If an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard, instead counter that spell, then scry 2.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标生物或鹏洛客咒语的操控者支付{2}，否则反击之。如果任一对手的坟墓场中有八张或更多牌，则改为反击该咒语，然后占卜2。

trans-unit.source: "I think not."\n—Flekon the Mindcensor
trans-unit.target: 「我认为不行。」 ～核灵师斐空

trans-unit.source: Beyeen Veil
trans-unit.target: 贝因雾帐

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·46 | Beyeen Veil | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控的生物得-2/-0直到回合结束。 地 {T}：加{U}。

trans-unit.source: "All you minnows in the murk, come to my light."\n—Jejenar, Silundi lullmage
trans-unit.target: 「浓雾中的小鱼，快来聚于这亮光周围。」 ～希隆迪息法师杰耶纳

trans-unit.source: Beyeen Coast
trans-unit.target: 贝因海岸

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·46 | Beyeen Coast | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}。 瞬间 {1}{U}

trans-unit.source: "Stay close to my light. You don't want to get lost on the rocks."\n—Jejenar, Silundi lullmage
trans-unit.target: 「跟紧这道亮光。莫在乱岩中迷路。」 ～希隆迪息法师杰耶纳

trans-unit.source: Bubble Snare
trans-unit.target: 水泡圈套

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·47 | Bubble Snare | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Enchant creature
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{2}{U}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{2}{U}。） 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，若它已增幅，则横置所结附的生物。 所结附的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: Cascade Seer
trans-unit.target: 飞瀑预言师

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·48 | Cascade Seer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry X, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜X，X为你冒险团中的生物数量。（冒险团由僧侣、浪客、战士和法术师组成，每种类别至多只计入一个。）

trans-unit.source: "Perhaps you can't see the path, but that doesn't mean it isn't there."
trans-unit.target: 「也许你没看到路，但这不代表眼前没有路。」

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·49 | Charix, the Raging Isle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Charix, the Raging Isle
trans-unit.target: 岛身怒怪凯立茨

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·49 | Charix, the Raging Isle | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Spells your opponents cast that target CARDNAME cost {2} more to cast.\n{3}: Charix gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Islands you control.
trans-unit.target: 对手施放之以CARDNAME为目标的咒语增加{2}来施放。 {3}：凯立茨得+X/-X直到回合结束，X为由你操控的海岛数量。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·49 | Charix, the Raging Isle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Zendikar's seas are deeper than anyone can fathom.
trans-unit.target: 赞迪卡的海洋深到无人能勘测。

trans-unit.source: Chilling Trap
trans-unit.target: 冰寒陷阱

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·50 | Chilling Trap | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. If you control a Wizard, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-4/-0直到回合结束。如果你操控法术师，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Serves you right for rushing ahead."\n—Kaliea, Sea Gate trapfinder
trans-unit.target: 「叫你往前冲，活该。」 ～海户探陷人卡理耶

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·51 | Cleric of Chill Depths | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cleric of Chill Depths
trans-unit.target: 寒渊僧侣

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·51 | Cleric of Chill Depths | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME阻挡一个生物时，该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·51 | Cleric of Chill Depths | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Before my people turned to false gods, we built a glittering city beneath the northern sea ice. The magic of ancient Benthidrix lives in me!"
trans-unit.target: 「早在族人转而信奉伪神之前，我们就已在北洋冰面下造就一座金光之城。远古深洋殿的魔力与我同存！」

trans-unit.source: Concerted Defense
trans-unit.target: 协力防御

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·52 | Concerted Defense | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1} plus an additional {1} for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
trans-unit.target: 除非目标非生物咒语的操控者支付{1}，并为你冒险团中的每个生物各支付{1}，否则反击之。（冒险团由僧侣、浪客、战士和法术师组成，每种类别至多只计入一个。）

trans-unit.source: "You mess with one of us, you mess with all of us!"
trans-unit.target: 「惹到其中一个，便是惹到所有人！」

trans-unit.source: Confounding Conundrum
trans-unit.target: 混乱谜团

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·53 | Confounding Conundrum | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card.\nWhenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if that player had another land enter the battlefield under their control this turn, they return a land they control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。 每当一个地在任一对手的操控下进战场时，若该牌手本回合中有另一个地在其操控下进战场，则他将一个由他操控的地移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Coralhelm Chronicler
trans-unit.target: 珊瑚盔年代史家

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·54 | Coralhelm Chronicler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a kicked spell, draw a card, then discard a card.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a card with a kicker ability from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放已增幅的咒语时，抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以展示其中一张具任一增幅异能的牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Cunning Geysermage
trans-unit.target: 狡黠热泉法师

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·55 | Cunning Geysermage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return up to one other target creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{2}{U}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{2}{U}。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，若它已增幅，则将至多另一个目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "Come on, Skitch, we'll lose them in the geyserfield."
trans-unit.target: 「快点，阿蜥，到了热泉原就能甩掉他们了。」

trans-unit.source: Deliberate
trans-unit.target: 深思熟虑

trans-unit.source: Scry 2, then draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 占卜2，然后抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "I can't see all that the future holds, but I can keep us one step ahead of death."
trans-unit.target: 「我虽不能看透未来的一切，但能让我们避开死亡一步。」

trans-unit.source: Expedition Diviner
trans-unit.target: 探险队占卜师

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·57 | Expedition Diviner | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nAs long as you control another Wizard, CARDNAME has "When this creature dies, draw a card."
trans-unit.target: 飞行 只要你操控另一个法术师，CARDNAME便具有「当此生物死去时，抓一张牌。」

trans-unit.source: Wizards' spells twist the fabric of reality to channel elemental energies, peer into the future, and even calm the Roil.
trans-unit.target: 法师咒语能够扭曲现实束缕，从而通联元素能量、窥见未来世界，甚或平息暴怒狂搅。

trans-unit.source: Field Research
trans-unit.target: 实地勘验

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·58 | Field Research | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)\nDraw two cards. If this spell was kicked, draw three cards instead.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{2}{U}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{2}{U}。） 抓两张牌。如果此咒语已增幅，则改为抓三张牌。

trans-unit.source: "In the field, speed-reading is a survival skill."
trans-unit.target: 「到了实地，读得快才能保住命。」

trans-unit.source: Glacial Grasp
trans-unit.target: 冰冻攫

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·59 | Glacial Grasp | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Tap target creature. Its controller mills two cards. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 横置目标生物。其操控者磨两张牌。该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。（他将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。） 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Glasspool Mimic
trans-unit.target: 璃池拟态妖

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·60 | Glasspool Mimic | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature you control, except it's a Shapeshifter Rogue in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成任一由你操控的生物之复制品来进入战场，但它额外具有「变形兽／浪客」此两个类别。 地 {T}：加{U}。

trans-unit.source: "When I touched the Glasspool, I tasted infinite possibility."\n—Ashen Wal, Akoum Expeditionary House
trans-unit.target: 「我手刚触碰璃池水面，便尝到了无尽可能。」 ～阿库姆探险队的爱森瓦

trans-unit.source: Glasspool Shore
trans-unit.target: 璃池湖岸

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·60 | Glasspool Shore | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}。 浪客 {2}{U}

trans-unit.source: "Past and possibility come together in the vastness of infinite reflection."\n—Ashen Wal, Akoum Expeditionary House
trans-unit.target: 「在广阔湖面倒影中，过往视像与未来愿景融为一体。」 ～阿库姆探险队的爱森瓦

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·61 | Inscription of Insight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Inscription of Insight
trans-unit.target: 预言铭文

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·61 | Inscription of Insight | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Kicker {2}{U}{U}
Choose one. If this spell was kicked, choose any number instead.
• Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
• Scry 2, then draw two cards.
• Target player creates an X/X blue Illusion creature token, where X is the number of cards in their hand.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{2}{U}{U} 选择一项。如果此咒语已增幅，则改为选择任意数量的选项。 •将至多两个目标生物移回其拥有者手上。 •占卜2，然后抓两张牌。 •目标牌手派出一个X/X蓝色虚影衍生生物，X为其手牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·62 | Into the Roil | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Into the Roil
trans-unit.target: 没入狂搅

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·62 | Into the Roil | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)\nReturn target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{1}{U}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{1}{U}。） 将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。如果此咒语已增幅，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·62 | Into the Roil | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In theory, the death of the Eldrazi should have stilled the Roil. It did not.
trans-unit.target: 理论上，奥札奇灭亡应能平息狂搅。实际上没有。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·63 | Jace, Mirror Mage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jace, Mirror Mage
trans-unit.target: 镜像法师杰斯

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·63 | Jace, Mirror Mage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Kicker {2}
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if Jace was kicked, create a token that's a copy of CARDNAME, except it's not legendary and its starting loyalty is 1.
[+1]: Scry 2.
[0]: Draw a card and reveal it. Remove a number of loyalty counters equal to that card's mana value from CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{2} 当CARDNAME进战场时，若杰斯已增幅，则派出一个为CARDNAME之复制品的衍生物，但它不是传奇，且起始忠诚为1。 +1：占卜2。 0：抓一张牌并展示之。从CARDNAME上移去若干忠诚指示物，其数量等同于该牌的总法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Jwari Disruption
trans-unit.target: 爪尔干扰

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·64 | Jwari Disruption | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{1}，否则反击之。 地 {T}：加{U}。

trans-unit.source: "You worry too much."\n—Nys Dal, Sea Gate trapfinder
trans-unit.target: 「你担心得太多了。」 ～海户探陷人尼斯达

trans-unit.source: Jwari Ruins
trans-unit.target: 爪尔遗迹

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·64 | Jwari Ruins | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}。 瞬间 {1}{U}

trans-unit.source: "The Ondu Skyclave was a center for rebellion against the capital in Makindi. Of course they built in deadly traps."\n—Nys Dal, Sea Gate trapfinder
trans-unit.target: 「当初马钦迪境内爆发针对都城的反抗斗争时，昂度空境便是争夺焦点。其中当然布有各式致命陷阱。」 ～海户探陷人尼斯达

trans-unit.source: Living Tempest
trans-unit.target: 生体风暴

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·65 | Living Tempest | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行

trans-unit.source: "If you don't like the weather, just wait a few minutes and it'll change ... probably for the worse."\n—Amandi, kitesail expert
trans-unit.target: 「你要是不喜欢这天气，只需等几分钟它就会变天. . .但多半是越变越差。」 ～航筝专家阿曼迪

trans-unit.source: Lullmage's Domination
trans-unit.target: 息法师的支配

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·66 | Lullmage's Domination | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a creature whose controller has eight or more cards in their graveyard.\nGain control of target creature with mana value X.
trans-unit.target: 如果为此咒语目标的生物之操控者坟墓场中有八张或更多牌，则此咒语减少{3}来施放。 获得目标总法术力费用为X的生物之操控权。

trans-unit.source: "One spell to quiet the Roil, one to quash the will. The principle is the same."
trans-unit.target: 「一个咒语平息狂搅，另外一个击碎意志。两者原理相通。」

trans-unit.source: Maddening Cacophony
trans-unit.target: 致狂杂音

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·67 | Maddening Cacophony | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {3}{U}\nEach opponent mills eight cards. If this spell was kicked, instead each opponent mills half their library, rounded up.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{3}{U} 每位对手各磨八张牌。如果此咒语已增幅，则改为每位对手各磨其牌库一半数量的牌，小数点后进位。

trans-unit.source: Jace traced Nahiri to the Singing City, but the magic of the ancient ruins threatened to overwhelm his mind.
trans-unit.target: 杰斯一路跟随娜希丽来到魅歌城，但这处远古遗迹的魔法却试图压垮他的心智。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·68 | Master of Winds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Master of Winds
trans-unit.target: 风幻大师

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·68 | Master of Winds | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then discard a card.\nWhenever you cast an instant, sorcery, or Wizard spell, you may have CARDNAME's base power and toughness become 4/1 or 1/4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓两张牌，然后弃一张牌。 每当你施放瞬间，法术或法术师咒语时，你可以使CARDNAME的基础力量与防御力成为4/1或1/4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Merfolk Falconer
trans-unit.target: 驯隼人鱼

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·69 | Merfolk Falconer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you cast a kicked spell, scry 2.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你施放已增幅的咒语时，占卜2。

trans-unit.source: "For generations, we have bred and trained falcons for expeditions into Emeria. Now more sky ruins open themselves to those with the means to reach the heights!"
trans-unit.target: 「数个世代之前，我们为了深入伊美黎探险，便早已开始繁育和训练猎隼。如今随着更多天空遗迹现身世间，唯有自由翱翔天空的族群才能在其间自由穿行。」

trans-unit.source: Merfolk Windrobber
trans-unit.target: 劫风人鱼

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·70 | Merfolk Windrobber | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player mills a card. (They put the top card of their library into their graveyard.)\nSacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card. Activate only if an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手磨一张牌。（他将其牌库顶的牌置入其坟墓场。） 牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。只能于任一对手的坟墓场中有八张或更多牌时起动此异能。

trans-unit.source: Negate
trans-unit.target: 失效

trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标非生物咒语。

trans-unit.source: "The ancient kor were a clever bunch with a taste for nasty traps. Spikes, poison, fire pouring forth with no warning . . . I've seen and disabled them all. If you intend to raid a Skyclave, you'd be wise to hire me on."
trans-unit.target: 「古代寇族头脑机敏，偏好摆弄凶险陷阱。出钉子的、涂剧毒的、突然喷火的. . .这些都被我一一看穿并全数解除。如果你想要去空境探险，带上我才是明智之举。」

trans-unit.source: Nimble Trapfinder
trans-unit.target: 矫捷探陷人

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·72 | Nimble Trapfinder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked if you had another Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, or Wizard enter the battlefield under your control this turn.\nAt the beginning of combat on your turn, if you have a full party, creatures you control gain "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card" until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 如果本回合中有另一个僧侣，浪客，战士或法术师在你的操控下进战场，则CARDNAME不能被阻挡。 在你回合的战斗开始时，若你的冒险团满编，则由你操控的生物获得「每当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌」直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Risen Riptide
trans-unit.target: 醒转浪涛

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·73 | Risen Riptide | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a kicked spell, CARDNAME has base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放已增幅的咒语时，CARDNAME的基础力量与防御力为5/5直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Most days the sea is my friend. But only most days."\n—Jori En, expedition leader
trans-unit.target: 「大多数日子里，大海都是我的朋友。但也只有大多数日子里是这样。」 ～探险队长裘黎恩

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·74 | Roost of Drakes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Roost of Drakes
trans-unit.target: 龙兽宿巢

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·74 | Roost of Drakes | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.\nWhenever you cast a kicked spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{2}{U}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{2}{U}。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，若它已增幅，则派出一个2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的龙兽衍生生物。 每当你施放已增幅的咒语时，派出一个2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的龙兽衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Ruin Crab
trans-unit.target: 遗迹蟹

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·75 | Ruin Crab | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent mills three cards. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，每位对手各磨三张牌。（磨一张牌的流程是牌手将其牌库顶的牌置入其坟墓场。）

trans-unit.source: To an explorer, a priceless treasure. To the crab, a rock to call home.
trans-unit.target: 在探险家眼中，这是无价之宝。在螃蟹眼中，这不过是块可以当家的石头。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·76 | Sea Gate Restoration | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sea Gate Restoration
trans-unit.target: 重建海户

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·76 | Sea Gate Restoration | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your hand plus one. You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
trans-unit.target: 抓若干牌，其数量等同于你的手牌数量加一。在本盘游戏接下来的时段，你的手牌数量没有上限。 地 {T}：加{U}。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·76 | Sea Gate Restoration | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We have much to remember ... and much we can never forget."\n—Tazri
trans-unit.target: 「我们有太多需要记住的. . .也有太多不能忘记的。」 ～塔兹莉

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·76 | Sea Gate, Reborn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sea Gate, Reborn
trans-unit.target: 新生海户

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·76 | Sea Gate, Reborn | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may pay 3 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U}.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，你可以支付3点生命。如果你未如此作，则它须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}。 法术 {4}{U}{U}{U}

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·76 | Sea Gate, Reborn | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We carry on the legacy of those who defended our world by continuing to unearth its secrets."\n—Tazri
trans-unit.target: 「我们继承守卫世界先人的衣钵，继续发掘其中秘密。」 ～塔兹莉

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·77 | Sea Gate Stormcaller | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sea Gate Stormcaller
trans-unit.target: 海户唤雷师

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·77 | Sea Gate Stormcaller | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {4}{U}\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, copy the next instant or sorcery spell with mana value 2 or less you cast this turn when you cast it. If CARDNAME was kicked, copy that spell twice instead. You may choose new targets for the copies.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{4}{U} 当CARDNAME进战场，本回合中，当你施放你的下一个总法术力费用等于或小于2的瞬间或法术咒语时，将它复制。若CARDNAME已增幅，则改为将该咒语复制两次。你可以为每个复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.source: Seafloor Stalker
trans-unit.target: 海床伏击客

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·78 | Seafloor Stalker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {4}{U}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
trans-unit.target: {4}{U}：CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束，且本回合不能被阻挡。你冒险团中每有一个生物，此异能便减少{1}来起动。（冒险团由僧侣、浪客、战士和法术师组成，每种类别至多只计入一个。）

trans-unit.source: "Sunken ruins? My specialty."
trans-unit.target: 「水底遗迹？我在行。」

trans-unit.source: Shell Shield
trans-unit.target: 坚壳护盾

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·79 | Shell Shield | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} as you cast this spell.)\nTarget creature you control gets +0/+3 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature also gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
trans-unit.target: 增幅{1}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{1}。） 目标由你操控的生物得+0/+3直到回合结束。如果此咒语已增幅，则该生物再获得辟邪异能直到回合结束。（它不能成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标。）

trans-unit.source: Silundi Vision
trans-unit.target: 希隆迪视像

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·80 | Silundi Vision | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以展示其中的一张瞬间或法术牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。 地 {T}：加{U}。

trans-unit.source: "Feel the current? Rough waters lie ahead."\n—Jori En, expedition leader
trans-unit.target: 「感受到这水流了吗？前面会十分湍急。」 ～探险队长裘黎恩

trans-unit.source: Silundi Isle
trans-unit.target: 希隆迪岛屿

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·80 | Silundi Isle | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}。 瞬间 {2}{U}

trans-unit.source: "From the hedron fields of Agadeem to the Faduun of Jwar Isle, the islands of the Silundi Sea offer one mystery after another."\n—Jori En, expedition leader
trans-unit.target: 「从艾格丁的晶石原野，到爪尔岛的冯颅石像，希隆迪海上的诸岛屿有着解不完的秘密。」 ～探险队长裘黎恩

trans-unit.source: Skyclave Plunder
trans-unit.target: 空境劫夺

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·81 | Skyclave Plunder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is three plus the number of creatures in your party. Put three of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的X张牌，X为你冒险团中的生物数量加三。将其中三张置于你手上，其余的牌则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。（冒险团由僧侣、浪客、战士和法术师组成，每种类别至多只计入一个。）

trans-unit.source: Skyclave Squid
trans-unit.target: 空境乌贼

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·82 | Skyclave Squid | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, CARDNAME can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
trans-unit.target: 守军 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，CARDNAME于本回合中能视同不具守军异能地进行攻击。

trans-unit.source: An ancient sea monster dragged the Murasa Skyclave under the waves, then smaller sea monsters moved in.
trans-unit.target: 远古海怪一举将姆拉撒空境拖入波涛之下，体型较小的海怪随即入住。

trans-unit.source: Sure-Footed Infiltrator
trans-unit.target: 稳步渗透客

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·83 | Sure-Footed Infiltrator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Tap another untapped Rogue you control: CARDNAME can't be blocked this turn.\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 横置另一个由你操控且未横置的浪客：CARDNAME本回合不能被阻挡。 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "I've yet to discover the ruin that can keep me out."
trans-unit.target: 「这世上还没见过我进不去的遗迹。」

trans-unit.source: Tazeem Roilmage
trans-unit.target: 塔晋狂搅法师

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·84 | Tazeem Roilmage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{4}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{4}。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，若它已增幅，则将目标瞬间或法术牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: "The Roil can be directed. Observe."
trans-unit.target: 「狂搅也能被引导。看好了。」

trans-unit.source: Thieving Skydiver
trans-unit.target: 跃空窃贼

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·85 | Thieving Skydiver | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {X}. X can't be 0. (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.)\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, gain control of target artifact with mana value X or less. If that artifact is an Equipment, attach it to CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{X}。X不能为0。（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{X}。） 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，若它已增幅，则获得目标总法术力费用等于或小于X的神器之操控权。若该神器是武具，则将它装备在CARDNAME上。

trans-unit.source: Umara Wizard
trans-unit.target: 乌玛拉法师

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·86 | Umara Wizard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant, sorcery, or Wizard spell, CARDNAME gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放瞬间，法术或法术师咒语时，CARDNAME获得飞行异能直到回合结束。 地 {T}：加{U}。

trans-unit.source: "You see a waterfall. I see a way up."\n—Ko Dari, expedition wizard
trans-unit.target: 「你看到的是瀑布。我看到的是上行道路。」 ～探险队法师蔻达黎

trans-unit.source: Umara Skyfalls
trans-unit.target: 乌玛拉天瀑

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·86 | Umara Skyfalls | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}。 法术师 {4}{U}

trans-unit.source: "The source of the Umara River sits high above Oran-Rief, ever weeping on the jungle below."\n—Ko Dari, expedition wizard
trans-unit.target: 「乌玛拉河的源头位于欧兰黎上空，滴落涓涓细流滋养其下丛林。」 ～探险队法师蔻达黎

trans-unit.source: Windrider Wizard
trans-unit.target: 御风法师

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·87 | Windrider Wizard | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you cast an instant, sorcery, or Wizard spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你施放瞬间，法术或法术师咒语时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "It's an ideal method for exploring sky ruins. The drakes sniff me briefly but then lose interest."
trans-unit.target: 「这是探索天空遗迹的理想办法。虽然龙兽嗅到了我的味道，但很快就失去了兴趣。」

trans-unit.source: Zulaport Duelist
trans-unit.target: 筑拉波斗客

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·88 | Zulaport Duelist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, up to one target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn. Its controller mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，至多一个目标生物得-2/-0直到回合结束。其操控者磨两张牌。（他将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。）

trans-unit.source: Acquisitions Expert
trans-unit.target: 取物专家

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·89 | Acquisitions Expert | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals a number of cards from their hand equal to the number of creatures in your party. You choose one of those cards. That player discards that card. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手从其手上展示若干牌，其数量等同于你冒险团中的生物数量。你从中选择一张。该牌手弃掉该牌。（冒险团由僧侣、浪客、战士和法术师组成，每种类别至多只计入一个。）

trans-unit.source: Agadeem's Awakening
trans-unit.target: 艾格丁觉醒

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·90 | Agadeem's Awakening | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return from your graveyard to the battlefield any number of target creature cards that each have a different mana value X or less.
trans-unit.target: 选择任意数量目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌，其总法术力费用须各不相同且均须等于或小于X。将它们从该处移回战场。 地 {T}：加{B}。

trans-unit.source: "Now is the death-hour, just before dawn. Wake, sleepers, and haunt the living!"\n—Vivias, Witch Vessel
trans-unit.target: 「现在正是拂晓之前的死亡时刻。觉醒吧，沉睡者，齐去侵扰生灵！」 ～祟体女巫威皮斯

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·90 | Agadeem, the Undercrypt | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Agadeem, the Undercrypt
trans-unit.target: 地底墓穴艾格丁

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·90 | Agadeem, the Undercrypt | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may pay 3 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B}.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，你可以支付3点生命。如果你未如此作，则它须横置进战场。 {T}：加{B}。 法术 {X}{B}{B}{B}

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·90 | Agadeem, the Undercrypt | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Here below the hedron fields, souls and secrets lie entombed."\n—Vivias, Witch Vessel
trans-unit.target: 「晶石原野之下，灵魂与秘密埋藏其间。」 ～祟体女巫威皮斯

trans-unit.source: Blackbloom Rogue
trans-unit.target: 黑郁湖浪客

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·91 | Blackbloom Rogue | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)\nCARDNAME gets +3/+0 as long as an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。） 只要任一对手的坟墓场中有八张或更多牌，CARDNAME便得+3/+0。 地 {T}：加{B}。

trans-unit.source: "If you ever want to get back up, do what I say."\n—Exena, expedition rogue
trans-unit.target: 「如果你还想爬出来，就按我说的去做。」 ～探险队盗贼埃席娜

trans-unit.source: Blackbloom Bog
trans-unit.target: 黑郁湖腐沼

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·91 | Blackbloom Bog | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{B}。 浪客 {2}{B}

trans-unit.source: "The Raimunza River flows along the branches of jaddi trees for miles before plunging down to feed Blackbloom Lake."\n—Exena, expedition rogue
trans-unit.target: 「莱姆札河顺着贾迪树丛枝蔓绵延数哩，最终全数汇入黑郁湖中。」 ～探险队浪客埃席娜

trans-unit.source: Blood Beckoning
trans-unit.target: 鲜血招诱

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·92 | Blood Beckoning | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)\nReturn target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If this spell was kicked, instead return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{3}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{3}。） 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。如果此咒语已增幅，则改为将两张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: Blood Price
trans-unit.target: 鲜血代价

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·93 | Blood Price | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的四张牌。将其中两张置于你手上，其余的牌则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Blood is the oldest currency.
trans-unit.target: 鲜血是最古老的货币。

trans-unit.source: Bloodchief's Thirst
trans-unit.target: 血侯饥渴

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·94 | Bloodchief's Thirst | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.)\nDestroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 2 or less. If this spell was kicked, instead destroy target creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{2}{B}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{2}{B}。） 消灭目标总法术力费用等于或小于2的生物或鹏洛客。如果此咒语已增幅，则改为消灭目标生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.source: "We are free. It is our duty to live well."
trans-unit.target: 「我们已得解放。因此有义务好好活下去。」

trans-unit.source: Coveted Prize
trans-unit.target: 诱人珍品

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·95 | Coveted Prize | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)\nSearch your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. If you have a full party, you may cast a spell with mana value 4 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 你冒险团中每有一个生物，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。（冒险团由僧侣、浪客、战士和法术师组成，每种类别至多只计入一个。） 从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。如果你的冒险团满编，则你可以从你手上施放一个总法术力费用等于或小于4的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Deadly Alliance
trans-unit.target: 联手夺命

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·96 | Deadly Alliance | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)\nDestroy target creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 你冒险团中每有一个生物，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。（冒险团由僧侣、浪客、战士和法术师组成，每种类别至多只计入一个。） 消灭目标生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.source: "He could handle any one of us, but he's no match for all of us!"
trans-unit.target: 「也许我们当中任一个都不是他的对手，但他应付不了我们所有人！」

trans-unit.source: Taborax's cultists are the latest in a long history of beings who have desired to see Zendikar torn to pieces.
trans-unit.target: 悠悠历史长河中，曾有无数势力希望眼见赞迪卡彻底毁灭；塔博锐教众是其中最新一支。

Dreadwurm

trans-unit.source: Its silent slithering belies its bulk.
trans-unit.target: 它静不可闻的滑行声响掩盖了庞巨身躯。

trans-unit.source: Rogues bring an array of useful skills to the work of an adventuring party: stealth, agility, the ability to locate and disarm traps, and a subtle, deadly fighting style.
trans-unit.target: 盗贼具备的独特技艺往往能让冒险团队事半功倍：他们难觅踪迹、身手敏捷，精于识破并解除陷阱，同时还可在无声之间取人性命。

trans-unit.source: Death comes in many forms on Guul Draz, most of them slow, subtle, and agonizing. At least a monstrous crocodile offers a swift death.

Choose one. If this spell was kicked, choose any number instead.

trans-unit.source: "The vampires never had gods. We followed our bloodchiefs. Now they are gone. What is left? Destruction and death, my friends. That is enough."
trans-unit.target: 「吸血鬼一族从未信奉过神明。我们唯血侯为尊。如今他们也一去不返。你要说还剩下什么？朋友，只要毁灭和死亡还在，这就足够了。」

trans-unit.source: The Kargan tribes share legends of the victory their ancestors won over the Akoum Skyclave, and its horrendous cost.
trans-unit.target: 卡加诸部族先祖曾齐心力克阿库姆空境取得辉煌胜利，同时也付出了惨痛代价。如今这传说仍在各部传扬。

trans-unit.source: Silence is an underrated hunting strategy.
trans-unit.target: 悄然出击是种被严重低估的行猎策略。

trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME has lifelink as long as it has five or more +1/+1 counters on it.\nWhenever another nontoken creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Taborax. If that creature was a Cleric, you may draw a card. If you do, you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 只要CARDNAME上有五个或更多+1/+1指示物，它便具有系命异能。 每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，在塔博锐上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若该死去的生物是僧侣，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则你失去1点生命。

(Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)\nReturn target creature card and up to one target Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, or Wizard creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

trans-unit.source: Open conflict between expeditionary houses—or even individual adventuring parties—is discouraged, but "accidents" happen.
trans-unit.target: 虽然台面上不提倡探险队甚或个别冒险团队之间公然对抗，但私底下的「意外」总是难免。

trans-unit.source: "Annihilation surrounds us. Our call is to embrace its ceaseless hunger."\n—Voshk, oblivion priest
trans-unit.target: 「毁灭将我们包围。我们的唯一出路便是屈服于这无尽饥渴。」 ～佚界僧侣沃什克

trans-unit.target: 「看看这里。你哪里还需要更多证据才明白生命孱弱无力、了无意义？」 ～佚界僧侣沃什克

trans-unit.target: 地狱犬群在尖岩原四处游荡，白天享受此处严酷阳光，晚间便用自身火光照亮夜空。

trans-unit.source: "I'm not cruel, but I have no patience for your mistakes."\n—Tyrux, expedition warrior

trans-unit.source: "Trust me, we won't need torches."

trans-unit.source: Every inferno begins with a spark.

trans-unit.source: Every rebirth looks like a death.

trans-unit.target: 战士都是战斗专家，能够于冒险团队在旅程中遇袭时，运用自己杀敌技巧化险为夷。

trans-unit.source: He might call up a burst of lava or a raging hellion from Akoum's volcanic depths. Or he might just fall in.
