trans-unit.source: "I've got a little surprise for you, beasties! Come and get it!"
trans-unit.target: 「我给你们准备了些惊喜，臭野兽！快过来啊！」

trans-unit.source: Gnarlid Colony
trans-unit.target: 群落糙节兽

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·185 | Gnarlid Colony | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)\nIf CARDNAME was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.\nEach creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{2}{G}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{2}{G}。） 如果CARDNAME已增幅，则它进战场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。 每个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物均具有践踏异能。

trans-unit.source: Where mana flows, the gnarlids follow.
trans-unit.target: 魔力充盈之处，糙节兽必随至。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·186 | Inscription of Abundance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Inscription of Abundance
trans-unit.target: 丰足铭文

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·186 | Inscription of Abundance | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Kicker {2}{G}
Choose one. If this spell was kicked, choose any number instead.
• Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
• Target player gains X life, where X is the greatest power among creatures they control.
• Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{2}{G} 选择一项。如果此咒语已增幅，则改为选择任意数量的选项。 •在目标生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物。 •目标牌手获得X点生命，X为由其操控的生物中力量最大者的数值。 •目标由你操控的生物与目标不由你操控的生物互斗。

trans-unit.source: Iridescent Hornbeetle
trans-unit.target: 虹彩角虫

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·187 | Iridescent Hornbeetle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token for each +1/+1 counter you've put on creatures under your control this turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，你本回合中每在由你操控的生物上放置过一个+1/+1指示物，便派出一个1/1绿色昆虫衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: The hatchlings will fill the jungles of Murasa in a glittering tide.
trans-unit.target: 其幼虫会让整个姆拉撒丛林色彩斑斓。

trans-unit.source: Joraga Visionary
trans-unit.target: 玖瑞加幻视师

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·188 | Joraga Visionary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "If you only follow where the paths lead, you merely go where others have gone before you."
trans-unit.target: 「如果你只沿着大路走，那你只能去到前人到过之处。」

trans-unit.source: Kazandu Mammoth
trans-unit.target: 卡赞度长毛象

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·189 | Kazandu Mammoth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，CARDNAME得+2/+2直到回合结束。 地 {T}：加{G}。

trans-unit.source: "It doesn't obey me. It cooperates with me."\n—Triel, Kazandu tuskcaller
trans-unit.target: 「它不听我的话。它只是配合我行动。」 ～卡赞度召牙师翠儿

trans-unit.source: Kazandu Valley
trans-unit.target: 卡赞度山谷

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·189 | Kazandu Valley | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {G}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{G}。 象 {1}{G}{G}

trans-unit.source: "The elves stick to the trees. Here, where the trees welcome the sky and leave room for grazing herds—this is our land."\n—Triel, Kazandu tuskcaller
trans-unit.target: 「妖精依树而生。而这里正是我们的理想家园～植木高耸迎天长，旷野坦阔任兽行。」 ～卡赞度召牙师翠儿

trans-unit.source: Kazandu Nectarpot
trans-unit.target: 卡赞度琼浆虫

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·190 | Kazandu Nectarpot | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The scythe-like forelegs are crucial for its survival, because it tastes really good and every inhabitant of Murasa knows it."\n—Arhana, Kazandu trapfinder
trans-unit.target: 「它们正是依靠那对如镰刀般锋利的前肢才得以存活至今，因为它们实在很美味，全姆拉撒的居民都知道。」 ～卡赞度探陷人亚哈娜

trans-unit.source: Kazandu Stomper
trans-unit.target: 卡赞度跺地兽

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·191 | Kazandu Stomper | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return up to two lands you control to their owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 当CARDNAME进战场时，将至多两个由你操控的地移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Elves revere cycles of renewal, but they prefer cycles that don't involve their homes getting smashed.
trans-unit.target: 妖精崇敬轮回新生，但他们更希望看到家园不会被夷为平地的那种轮回。

trans-unit.source: Khalni Ambush
trans-unit.target: 坎尼伏击

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·192 | Khalni Ambush | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物与目标不由你操控的生物互斗。（它们各向对方造成等同于本身力量的伤害。） 地 {T}：加{G}。

trans-unit.source: "The difference between life and death in Ora Ondar is about three seconds of startled screaming."\n—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter
trans-unit.target: 「欧拉昂达上生与死之间的差距不过三秒钟的尖叫而已。」 ～抄捷径鬼怪食虫拉夫

trans-unit.source: Khalni Territory
trans-unit.target: 坎尼领地

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·192 | Khalni Territory | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {G}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{G}。 瞬间 {2}{G}

trans-unit.source: "If you wander into the Khalni Garden without knowing the signs of a scythecat's territory, you're not going to live long enough to learn."\n—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter
trans-unit.target: 「如果你不慎误闯坎尼花园，而又不知道哪里是镰刃猫的领地，那你应该活不到学会分辨的那一刻。」 ～抄捷径鬼怪食虫拉夫

trans-unit.source: Lotus Cobra
trans-unit.target: 莲花眼镜蛇

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·193 | Lotus Cobra | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，加一点任意颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.source: Its hood blossoms as a warning: receive your gift, but stray no closer.
trans-unit.target: 它颈部鼓胀便是警告：收下礼物，切勿靠近。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·194 | Might of Murasa | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Might of Murasa
trans-unit.target: 姆拉撒之力

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·194 | Might of Murasa | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)\nTarget creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{2}{G}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{2}{G}。） 目标生物得+3/+3直到回合结束。如果此咒语已增幅，则改为该生物得+5/+5直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·194 | Might of Murasa | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The continent of Murasa is defined by irrepressible growth, both natural and otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 姆拉撒大陆的特征在于万物成长不受控制，无论自然与否。

trans-unit.source: Murasa Brute
trans-unit.target: 姆拉撒蛮汉

trans-unit.source: Some adventuring parties are made up of old friends, their common bonds bolstering them in the face of peril. Other parties simply hire the biggest, meanest muscle they can find.
trans-unit.target: 有些冒险团队成员相互熟识，在遇到危险时依靠彼此鼓励挺过难关。而有些冒险团队就只是去物色最孔武有力的巨汉雇来当打手。

trans-unit.source: Murasa Sproutling
trans-unit.target: 姆拉撒播芽灵

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·196 | Murasa Sproutling | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target card with a kicker ability from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{1}{G}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{1}{G}。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，若它已增幅，则将目标具任一增幅异能的牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: The seeds of memory grow eternal.
trans-unit.target: 记忆的种子长盛不衰。

trans-unit.source: Nissa's Zendikon
trans-unit.target: 妮莎的赞迪肯

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·197 | Nissa's Zendikon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant land\nEnchanted land is a 4/4 Elemental creature with reach and haste. It's still a land.\nWhen enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 结附于地 所结附的地是4/4，具敏捷与延势异能的元素生物。它仍然是地。 当所结附的地死去时，将该地牌移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Oran-Rief Ooze
trans-unit.target: 欧兰黎流浆

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·198 | Oran-Rief Ooze | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 每当CARDNAME攻击时，在每个进行攻击且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Rabid Bite
trans-unit.target: 狂疾啃咬

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·199 | Rabid Bite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物对目标不由你操控的生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。

trans-unit.source: A healthy felidar is voracious yet regal. A rabid felidar is nothing more than appetite lashed to frothing jaws.
trans-unit.target: 健康的晶角兽虽也会大口吞咽，但仍不失威严气质。染疾的晶角兽就只晓得张开血盆大口，屈从于无魇食欲。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·200 | Reclaim the Wastes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reclaim the Wastes
trans-unit.target: 荒野复碧

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·200 | Reclaim the Wastes | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)\nSearch your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. If this spell was kicked, search your library for two basic land cards instead of one.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{3}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{3}。） 从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。如果此咒语已增幅，则改为从你的牌库中搜寻两张基本地牌，而非一张。

trans-unit.source: Roiling Regrowth
trans-unit.target: 狂搅滋芽

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·201 | Roiling Regrowth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个地。从你的牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌，将它们横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "Roots find their way through rock, and even mountains must give way to new growth."\n—Nissa Revane
trans-unit.target: 「树根会想方设法穿过石块，就连高山也得给新苗让路。」 ～妮莎瑞文

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·202 | Scale the Heights | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 勇攀高峰

trans-unit.source: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. You gain 2 life. You may play an additional land this turn.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在至多一个目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。你获得2点生命。本回合中，你可以额外使用一个地。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·202 | Scale the Heights | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Ever onward, ever skyward."
trans-unit.target: 「攀高峰，登天际。」

trans-unit.source: Scute Swarm
trans-unit.target: 硬盔虫聚群

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·203 | Scute Swarm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token. If you control six or more lands, create a token that's a copy of CARDNAME instead.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，派出一个1/1绿色昆虫衍生生物。若你操控六个或更多地，则改为派出一个为CARDNAME之复制品的衍生物。

trans-unit.source: "Survival rule 782: There are *always* more scute bugs."\n—Zurdi, goblin shortcutter
trans-unit.target: 「生存法则第782项：硬盔虫*只会*更多。」 ～抄捷径鬼怪组棣

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.\nEquip {2}{G}
For use on cliffs and other faces.
trans-unit.target: 适用于山崖及其他表面。

trans-unit.source: Springmantle Cleric
trans-unit.target: 春纺僧侣

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·205 | Springmantle Cleric | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有数个+1/+1指示物，其数量为施放它时用来支付费用的法术力颜色数量。

trans-unit.source: Hope and courage bloom in her wake.
trans-unit.target: 希望与勇气随她脚步绽放。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·206 | Strength of Solidarity | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 团结之力

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·206 | Strength of Solidarity | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose target creature you control. Put a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
trans-unit.target: 选择目标由你操控的生物。你冒险团中每有一个生物，便在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。（冒险团由僧侣、浪客、战士和法术师组成，每种类别至多只计入一个。）

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·206 | Strength of Solidarity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This expedition doesn't succeed unless we all succeed!"
trans-unit.target: 「所有人都同享喜悦，本次冒险才算成功！」

trans-unit.source: Swarm Shambler
trans-unit.target: 跛行菌兽

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·207 | Swarm Shambler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.\nWhenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it becomes the target of a spell an opponent controls, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.\n{1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。 每当一个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物成为由对手操控之咒语的目标时，派出一个1/1绿色昆虫衍生生物。 {1}，{T}：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Tajuru Blightblade
trans-unit.target: 特裘如枯刃客

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·208 | Tajuru Blightblade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 死触

trans-unit.source: Ora Ondar, the Khalni Garden, is a lush tangle of growth in the harsh lands of Akoum. Its plant growth is marvelously diverse: a brilliant spectrum of vibrant life . . . and speedy death.
trans-unit.target: 欧拉昂达又称坎尼花园，是阿库姆荒地中一处葱郁丛林。此处植物种类繁多、包罗万象：既有茁壮成长的盎然生机. . .也有能迅速致命的剧烈毒物。

trans-unit.source: Tajuru Paragon
trans-unit.target: 特裘如典范

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·209 | Tajuru Paragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME is also a Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.\nKicker {3}\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, reveal the top six cards of your library. You may put a card that shares a creature type with it from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Tajuru Snarecaster
trans-unit.target: 特裘如布陷手

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·210 | Tajuru Snarecaster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reach
trans-unit.target: 延势

trans-unit.source: Elves of the Tajuru Nation spend their lives in the ancient jaddi trees' expansive canopy, some living and dying without ever touching the ground.
trans-unit.target: 特裘如一族妖精终生居于古老贾迪巨树广阔林冠之上，有些人一辈子都未曾接触地面。

trans-unit.source: Tangled Florahedron
trans-unit.target: 杂生花晶石

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·211 | Tangled Florahedron | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G}.
"As Bala Ged regrows, new forms of life blossom with unfettered wonder."\n—Doral, Bala Ged guide
trans-unit.target: 「随着巴勒格开始复苏，新的生命如奇迹般恣意绽放。」 ～巴勒格向导多拉尔

trans-unit.source: Tangled Vale
trans-unit.target: 缠结林谷

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·211 | Tangled Vale | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {G}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{G}。 元素 {1}{G}

trans-unit.source: "We would do well to open our eyes and remember what it is to wonder."\n—Doral, Bala Ged guide
trans-unit.target: 「我们只需要睁大双眼，好好记住这片自然奇迹。」 ～巴勒格向导多拉尔

trans-unit.source: Taunting Arbormage
trans-unit.target: 寻衅乔木法师

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·212 | Taunting Arbormage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, all creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{3}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{3}。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，若它已增幅，则本回合中，所有能阻挡目标生物的生物皆须阻挡之。

trans-unit.source: "Eyes on me!"
trans-unit.target: 「都看到我这边！」

trans-unit.source: Territorial Scythecat
trans-unit.target: 据地镰刃猫

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·213 | Territorial Scythecat | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Standing between a scythecat and its prey makes you the appetizer.
trans-unit.target: 如果站在镰刃猫和它的猎物之间，你就成了开胃菜。

trans-unit.source: Turntimber Ascetic
trans-unit.target: 旋林苦修士

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·214 | Turntimber Ascetic | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "For so long, this land cried out in pain. Now, as the flow returns to its balance point, a new harmony echoes in the trees."
trans-unit.target: 「许多年来，这片大陆在痛苦呻吟。如今能量流动重归平衡，林木之间回响着全新和韵。」

trans-unit.source: Turntimber Symbiosis
trans-unit.target: 旋林共生

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·215 | Turntimber Symbiosis | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. If that card has mana value 3 or less, it enters with three additional +1/+1 counters on it. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的七张牌。你可以将其中的一张生物牌放进战场。如果该牌的总法术力费用等于或小于3，则它进战场时上面额外有三个+1/+1指示物。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。 地 {T}：加{G}。

trans-unit.target: 诈术师泽雷尚

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·242 | Zareth San, the Trickster | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\n{2}{U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacking Rogue you control to its owner's hand: Put CARDNAME from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.\nWhenever Zareth San deals combat damage to a player, you may put target permanent card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 {2}{U}{B}，将一个由你操控、进行攻击且未受阻挡的浪客移回其拥有者手上：将CARDNAME从你手上横置放进战场且正进行攻击。 每当泽雷尚对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以将目标永久物牌在你的操控下从该牌手的坟墓场放进战场。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.\nEquipped creature has flying.\nEquip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将它装备在目标由你操控的生物上。 佩带此武具的生物具有飞行异能。 佩带{2}（{2}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上。佩带的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Made from canvas, wood, and hope.

trans-unit.source: Colorless creatures you control get +2/+2.\nWhenever you tap a permanent for {C}, add an additional {C}.\nWhenever you cast a colorless spell, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的无色生物得+2/+2。 每当你横置一个永久物以产生{C}时，额外加{C}。 每当你施放无色咒语时，你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "We shall forever roam."\n—Ayli, high priest of the Eternal Pilgrims

You may choose new targets for the copy.\n{4}, {T}: Copy target permanent spell you control. (The copy becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：复制目标由你操控的起动式或触发式异能。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。 {3}，{T}：复制目标由你操控的瞬间或法术咒语。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。 {4}，{T}：复制目标由你操控的永久物咒语。（所成之复制品会成为衍生物。）
